ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Quickly connect to WiFi networks by scanning text containing WiFi credentials, eliminating the need for manual SSID and password entry.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Text Recognition (OCR) for WiFi credentials â€¢ Image Picker for importing WiFi information from gallery â€¢ WiFi Network Scanning â€¢ Fuzzy Matching of extracted credentials with available networks â€¢ WiFi Connection to matched networks
ðŸ“– Summary: Wify is a React Native application designed to simplify WiFi connection. It uses OCR to extract WiFi credentials from images or camera input, matches them with nearby networks, and automatically connects. This eliminates the need to manually search for and type in network names and passwords, especially useful in environments with complex WiFi setups.
